original: dam chos gsung rab yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar bar //
analyzed: dam chos gsung rab yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar bar //
translated: The wish-fulfilling jewel of the sublime Dharma, the shining light of the Buddha's excellent speech,

original: yid dang rin chen mang po sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas //

original: mkhyen bzhi shes bcu gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa yi //
analyzed: mkhyen bzhi shes bcu gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa yi //

original: chos rje sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // chos mdzad rang rgyal nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad la //
analyzed: chos rje sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // chos mdzad rang rgyal nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad la //
translated: Dharma practitioners, pratyekabuddhas, and noble shravakas,

original: lus btud dad pa'i spyi bos phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi //
analyzed: lus btud dad pa'i spyi bos phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi //
translated: I bow my body and with the crown of my faithful mind I pay homage and make offerings.

original: chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi //

original: thugs rjes snyoms pa'i mar dang ting nge 'dzin snying po las //
analyzed: thugs rjes snyoms pa'i mar dang ting nge 'dzin snying po las //

original: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gsal ba'i mar me 'bar //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gsal ba'i mar me 'bar //
translated: The lamp of the clear wisdom of purification burns.

original: 'od bzang bdud rtsi srid gsum 'jig rten thams cad khyab //
analyzed: 'od bzang bdud rtsi srid gsum 'jig rten thams cad khyab //
translated: The good light of nectar pervades the three existences and all worlds.

original: sdug bsngal nad sel mi shes mun pa kun sel ba //
analyzed: sdug bsngal nad sel mi shes mun pa kun sel ba //
translated: It removes the sickness of suffering and clears away all the darkness of ignorance.

original: dam chos mdo yi sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //ğŸ”½dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la gus @332a * //

original: pas phyag 'tshal mchod //
analyzed: pas phyag 'tshal mchod //

original: dam chos lung bstan sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod //
analyzed: dam chos lung bstan sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod //
